room_title: Escape room "Pet Snatched" by Exit Strategy in Sacramento
review: We did the Pet Snatched game for our 10 year old's birthday and it was great! The story was fun, puzzles were challenging, and our gamemaster was very helpful and friendly. It was a super fun activity!!

room_title: Escape room "Pet Snatched" by Exit Strategy in Sacramento
review: Had a wonderful experience at this escape room company. The game master was very welcoming and was also very helpful. We played pet snatched and we had such a wonderful time. Can't wait to go back for the other rooms that they have. Thanks for a fun and amazing experience. See you soon!

room_title: Escape room "Pet Snatched" by Exit Strategy in Sacramento
review: I took group of kids 10-13 and we did the pet game.  We had a blast.  All the kids want to do it again.
